section: 4. The duration of this Venture (the "Term") will begin on March 1, 2020 and continue in full force and effect until February 28, 2025 or as otherwise provided in this Agreement.
explanation: The phrase "or as otherwise provided in this Agreement" introduces ambiguity about the term's end date. While a specific end date is given, the additional clause suggests other sections might contradict or alter it, creating uncertainty about the actual duration.

section: Purpose 3. The Purpose of the Venture will be determined by the Managers.
explanation: Although it is mentioned that the managers of the company will determine the purpose of the venture, it is not stated that the Members need to be involved. Typically, with important things like this, the Members should be involved as well, even in the most minor way.

section: Capital Contributions 15. Each of the Members has contributed to the capital of the Venture, in cash or property in agreed upon value, as follows (the "Capital Contribution"): Member Contribution Description Agreed Value BorrowMoney.com, inc To be determined USD JVLS, LLC dba Vaccines 2Go $60,000.00 USD From Monthly Government , City And State, And Or Private Awarded Contracts. Plus (10%) Of Any Generated Gross Revenue, In Add i t i on to The To ta l Contributions. $3,500,000.00 USD
explanation: The Agreed Value of BorrowMoney.com, inc is said to be 'To be determined USD', however this is not a determiend or final value. Due to the lack of final value, the value is ambiguous. In addition, the wording of the contributions is also ambiguous, as the way it is worded does not clearly state that the funds are to be from the mentioned sources.
